title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1.20 - Counsel in commission interview or investigation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1.20 - Counsel in commission interview or investigation

State Regulations

In connection with any investigation conducted by the
commission, a person interviewed or questioned under oath shall have the right
to be accompanied and represented by counsel, except that he shall not be so
accompanied or represented by counsel who also represents a person who is or
who may become the subject of the investigation, unless the commission upon
application so authorizes. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21

1.20

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
